Text:
2.4 gigs per image average!!!

Are you F***ING NUTS???

That's what I call high-resolution :-D

You still can choose to download only lower-resolution version, it's only 84Mb.

I started downloading this not realizing the size, soon put a stop to that; I even gave it a +1 thinking it was another torrent, (My bad), but I give it -1, this way too large, who the hell would seed this?
